mapper.select: select count(1) from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main where code in( select p.code from phis_chss.v_fha_person_main p join phis_chss.v_fhc_check_main c on p.code=c.code where p.birthday <= add_months(sysdate,-12*65) group by p.code) AND managedcentercode = #{unitId} AND createdtime >= #{startDate} AND createdtime < #{endDate}
